name: Battle Realms Game Data File
summary: Learn about .H2O files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: An H2O file is a compressed game data container file used by Battle Realms, an older real-time strategy game developed by Liquid Entertainment and released by Ubisoft. It can store various types of game data, including sounds, models, animations, terrain, textures, and other data.

instructions: You can use the following utilities to extract the game data that H2O files contain:
Total Commander, with the Gamer Archive UnPacker PRO plug-in installed (Windows)
Double Commander, with the Gamer Archive UnPacker PRO plug-in installed (multiplatform)
